content.rendered:
Rates apply depending on markets using weight or piece methods and are calculated based on the following four zones of travel:

Zone               Destination
Zone 1 Middle East: UAE, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia, Kuwait, Egypt, Iran, Iraq, Jordan, Lebanon, Sudan, Syria, Yemen
Indian Subcontinent: Afghanistan, Bangladesh, Bhutan, India, Nepal, Pakistan, Maldives, Sri Lanka
Zone 2 Europe, Russia, Belarus, Armenia, Kazakhstan, Seychelles, Asia, China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, Thailand, Vietnam, Africa, Kenya, Nigeria and rest of Africa
Zone 3 Australia, South West Pacific, Japan and Korea
Zone 4 USA, Canada and Brazil

Airport Rates for Piece Concept Markets

Airport Rates for piece markets
Zones Upgrade bag to 32kg Second 23kg bag Third 23kg bag and onwards Extra 32kg bag
Zone 1 to 1
(except between GCC-ISC)		 USD 55 USD 99 USD 120 USD125
BJS-NGO USD 55 USD 99 USD 120 USD125
Zone 1 to 2 or
Zone 2 to 2		 USD 90 USD 160 USD 220 USD 235
Trips to/from Americas
(US, Canada & Brazil)		 USD 99 N/A USD 300 USD 350
To/From Japan, Australia and Korea USD 90 USD 185 USD 320 USD 360

*Extra Option for Economy Class-Increase the weight of one free bag from 23kg to 32kg

Excess Baggage Rates for Air Seychelles domestic network

Between Travel RBD Rate
SEZ PRI PORTION YMKHLV USD7
SEZ PRI PORTION SG USD4

 

For more details visit : https://www.airseychelles.com/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Seychelles Hand | Cabin Baggage

Air Seychelles Checked  Baggage
